title: How Santa Clara uses IoT, open data to tackle NFL invasion
text:
17 How Santa Clara uses IoT, open data to tackle NFL invasion 
Statescoop: Handling the massive demands of a National Football League game is still a pretty new civic challenge for city staff in Santa Clara, California.When the San Francisco 49ers moved into their new home in Leviâ€™s Stadium for the start of the 2014 season, city IT leaders immediately started to think about how they could start pitching in to ease the congestion and chaos created by the sudden influx of football fans.
